short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Socially Conscious Consumption for Amazon Shoppers. Make sure the brands you buy have the same ethical standards you do.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You can buy almost anything on Amazon, but do the products you buy have the same ethical standards you do? Use this extension on any Amazon Product Page to learn more about the brands before you buy.

For more information contact us at dogwearingsunnies@gmail.com. üê∂üï∂Ô∏èüëç

Version 0.3.3 - Added Fortune 500 companies that did not pay any taxes in 2018 as a cause

Version 0.3.2 - Added Customs and Border Patrol (ICE) as a cause

Version 0.3.0 - Switched the extension to Webpack to pull external packages. Added better handling of products with authors. Added a quick link for incorrect product information.

Version 0.2.5 - Added Trump as a cause. This is the first cause that will give you a yes or no answer in the extension. No need to follow the link and search!
